items.details:
SCIENCE CLASS

Today in science we explored  and . We carried out experiments using magnets and blowing air to put objects into motion. After that, we had some races and finished off with a game to demonstrate how magnetic fields work as a non-contact force. It was a fun and hands-on way to learn about forces and motion!

MAP TESTING

MAP testing is coming up from September 22–26. If you are going to be absent on any of those days, please let me know so we can arrange for you to take the test early.

To prepare for math, you can practice on Khan Academy. For reading, you can use ReadWorks, take AR quizzes, and read as much as you can. For science and social studies, you can review your textbooks and read nonfiction books.

Let’s all be ready and do our best.

Upcoming Tests

Friday, September 19 - Science Topic 1 test
Tuesday, September 23rd - Language Arts - Grammar Workshop Unit 1 L1-8
Monday, September 29th - Social Studies - Topic 1

Spanish 

Tomorrow there will be a test in Spanish. Please learn the numbers 1-30.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A_Uq4BuFqHY  

Reading.

Today we learned about the layers of the rainforest. We started a teamwork poster to show the 4 layers of the rainforest.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=blh3Kq9xf_o 

Tomorrow you will complete the poster. Please bring some things to decorate your poster. You can print some pictures or bring some bright, colorful things to make your poster bright and interesting.
.

The next story in the book is Cocoliso

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aGrbVelGJOI 

Please watch the video and become familiar with the story.

The spelling words for next week are 

aim
aware
defeat
drift
mild
pause
refuse
route
ruin
solid

Please revise them before Friday.

I have assigned 7 fables for you to complete in ReadWorks. Please work on them over the next two weeks. They should all be complete this week.

 Go to www.readworks.org/student 

Enter our class code YU6GQ2
Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it
Take your time, do your best reading, and enjoy the stories.

PLEASE TRY YOUR BEST TO LOG IN AND GIVE AN ANSWER. PLEASE DO NOT WRITE KOREAN OR WRITE ‘I DON’T KNOW’

You borrowed some new books from the library. Please try to have a regular reading pattern and complete the AR quizzes after you read each book. 

Math

WELL DONE ON COMPLETING THE MATH TEST TODAY

Tonight please log-in and complete 20-30 mins of Khan Academy

https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E 

You can also try Khan Academy for grades 4 and 5 if you want more challenges. Please do this after completing grade 3 work.

Social Studies

Read and complete pages 28-31 in the social studies book.

ReadWorks Assignment 5/6 – Tropical Rainforests / Natural Resources (8 stories)

I have assigned a story on Rainforest and 8 stories about natural disasters on ReadWorks. Please complete it within the next 2 weeks.

 Go to www.readworks.org/student 

Enter our class code YU6GQ2
Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it

Science

Today we had a fun time learning about contact force and non-contact force. To embed the learning, please watch the following videos.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5-2NLHB4Gxg

Chinese

Complete the Chinese writing.

Chinese test next Tuesday.

Korean
